original: intros x. split. - intros H. split. + apply (deduction_andp_intros _ x TT). apply deduction_assum. apply H. + apply (deduction_andp_elim1 _ x TT). apply H. - intros [H1 H2]. apply (deduction_andp_intros _ x TT). + apply (deduction_andp_elim1 _ x TT). apply H1. + apply (deduction_andp_elim2 _ x TT). apply H2.
